languages.text: "Убийство, умысел к обогащению имеющее, есть преступление. Убийство, что было совершено из праведных целей, является подвигом, почитаемым и превозносимым".
"To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is a deed to be honoured and exalted."
languages.original_text: "Убийство, умысел к обогащению имеющее, есть преступление. Убийство, что было совершено из праведных целей, является подвигом, почитаемым и превозносимым".

traits.locale_text: "To kill with the intent to enrich oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is to be honoured and exalted."
"To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is to be honoured and exalted."
"To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is to be honoured and exalted."
"To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is a deed to be honoured and exalted."
"To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is a deed to be honoured and exalted."

languages.text: "Zu töten, um sich selbst zu bereichern, ist ein Verbrechen. Für eine gerechte Sache zu töten, ist ehrenhaft und lobenswert."
languages.original_text: "To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is a deed to be honoured and exalted."

traits.locale_text: "Zu töten, um sich selbst zu bereichern, ist ein Verbrechen. Für eine gerechte Sache zu töten, ist ehrenhaft und lobenswert."

languages.text: « Tuer avec l'intention de s'enrichir est un crime. Tuer pour une cause juste est un acte qui mérite d'être honoré et exalté. »
languages.original_text: "To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is a deed to be honoured and exalted."

traits.locale_text: « Tuer avec l'intention de s'enrichir est un crime. Tuer pour une cause juste est un acte qui mérite d'être honoré et exalté. »

languages.text: “为了获取财富而杀人是犯罪行为，但为了伸张正义而杀人值得尊崇。”
languages.original_text: "To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is a deed to be honoured and exalted."

traits.locale_text: “为了获取财富而杀人是犯罪行为，但为了伸张正义而杀人值得尊崇。”

languages.text: «Matar con el propósito de enriquecerse es delito. Matar por una causa justa es motivo de honra y exaltación».
languages.original_text: "To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is a deed to be honoured and exalted."

traits.locale_text: «Matar con el propósito de enriquecerse es delito. Matar por una causa justa es motivo de honra y exaltación».

languages.text: 「自分を富ませるために殺すことは犯罪である。正しい目的のために殺すことは、名誉あることであり、高尚なことである」
languages.original_text: "To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is a deed to be honoured and exalted."

traits.locale_text: 「自分を富ませるために殺すことは犯罪である。正しい目的のために殺すことは、名誉あることであり、高尚なことである」

languages.text: "Kendi menfaatini artırmak maksadıyla öldürmek suçtur. Haklı bir dava uğruna öldürmek ise övülüp yüceltilmesi gereken bir iştir."
languages.original_text: "To kill with the intent of enriching oneself is a crime. To kill for a righteous cause is a deed to be honoured and exalted."

traits.locale_text: "Kendi menfaatini artırmak maksadıyla öldürmek bir suçtur. Haklı bir dava uğruna öldürmek ise övülüp yüceltilmesi gereken bir iştir."
